Posts.Content: May 7, 2017 02:00PM Vascherr wrote: I'm only about a month out from the Savi radiation treatment after my lumpectomy. My pain has been increasing and yesterday it was constant almost all day. I'm sure it's just healing but I take norco for back pain and it worries me that I feel that much pain even with the pain meds. Any similar situations? Any idea if stress can increase the pain
Posts.Title: Pain in lumpectomy site years later Rachel1 mom2bunky
